item.title: Management Reporter Dimension Sets and AX Update The latest information on Management Reporter Dimension Sets and AX.
item.description: In an update to a previous post about Dimension Sets not functioning with Management Reporter in AX2012, it has been officially recognized as a quality report. The issue is expected to be addressed in the March release of MR2012. The current limitations within Management Reporter, including the inability to utilize Dimension Sets and a 512 character restriction for dimension strings in rows, columns, or trees, creates challenges for report design. Particularly when working with extensive or intricate charts of accounts, users are encountering workarounds like creating numerous individual rows followed by a total row.
